column4: my server won't serve php files.  when I go to my localhost it wants me to download a phtml file.  can anyone help?
- you must install and enable php
: I suggest vi /etc/php.ini and see for engine=on
: you must open it with sudo
I'm not a linux n00b :)  I'm just having php problems :)
: in ubuntu php.ini is located at /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini
: have you enabled mod_php in apache?
as jrib said, I *shouldn't* have to had to done anything
I have a php5.conf in my /etc/apache2/mods-enabled
